original: 'di ni phyis bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di ni phyis bshad par bya'o //

original: de nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i gsung dang / de'i rjes su 'brang ba'i tshig kyang thams cad du tshad ma dang gnod par byed pa yang yin no zhes gnas so //

original: gal te nges par tshu rol mthong bas ji ltar yang nus na yin gyi gzhan du ma yin no //
analyzed: gal te nges par tshu rol mthong bas ji ltar yang nus na yin gyi gzhan du ma yin no //

analyzed: khyab pa'i rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa rjes su gzung ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //

analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis phan 'dogs pa dang ldan pa yon tan ma bshad pa mi srid do //

original: nyes pa med de gang gi phyir rtag tu phan pa byed pa nyid du kho bo cag gis bshad pa'i phyir lnga pa yin te /
analyzed: nyes pa med de gang gi phyir rtag tu phan pa byed pa nyid du kho bo cag gis bshad pa'i phyir lnga pa yin te /

original: skyas pa las zhes brjod do //
analyzed: skyas pa las zhes brjod do //

original: 'di yod na 'di 'byung ngo zhes pas rtag tu 'jug pa gsungs pa yin no //

original: gzhan du na de med kyang yod na 'di de'i @36b rgyu mtshan gyi dngos por yang mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan du na de med kyang yod na 'di de'i @36b rgyu mtshan gyi dngos por yang mi 'gyur ro //

original: lnga pa ni 'byung khungs yin te 'byung khungs kyang skye ba'i byed pa po las byung zhes pas so //
analyzed: lnga pa ni 'byung khungs yin te 'byung khungs kyang skye ba'i byed pa po las byung zhes pas so //

analyzed: 'byung ba yang rgyu mtshan nyid yin no //

original: de yang tshad ma'i yul la thams cad mkhyen pas brjod pa'i lung dang 'gal ba'i gnod pa med pas 'brel ba med pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de yang tshad ma'i yul la thams cad mkhyen pas brjod pa'i lung dang 'gal ba'i gnod pa med pas 'brel ba med pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
translated: Moreover, since there is no contradiction with the scriptures spoken by the Omniscient One, the object of valid cognition is not related to the scriptures.

analyzed: de'i phyir 'di ltar thams cad du thams cad mkhyen pa'i bka'i gnod pa zhes rtogs par bya'o //

original: ji ltar yang thams cad kun rdzob tu khas len pa la tshad ma dang lung gis gnod pas 'di med pa'i phyir dbu ma la phyi rol du gyur pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar yang thams cad kun rdzob tu khas len pa la tshad ma dang lung gis gnod pas 'di med pa'i phyir dbu ma la phyi rol du gyur pa nyid yin no //
translated: Since the acceptance of everything as conventional is contradicted by valid cognition and scripture, this [view] is outside the Middle Way because it does not exist.

original: de bzhin du rgyas par kho bos don dam pa sgrub par bshad pas de nyid du rtogs par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du rgyas par kho bos don dam pa sgrub par bshad pas de nyid du rtogs par bya'o //

original: de skad du yang slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis gsungs pa //
analyzed: de skad du yang slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis gsungs pa //
translated: Master Vasubandhu also said:

analyzed: bstan pa 'di la 'byung bar 'gyur ba yin //

original: gang 'di gcig ni gang zag 'dzin pa ste //
analyzed: gang 'di gcig ni gang zag 'dzin pa ste //

original: gzhan dag thams cad med ces 'dzin pa yin //
analyzed: gzhan dag thams cad med ces 'dzin pa yin //

original: zhes so // de 'phags pa thogs med kyis byang chub sems dpa'i sa las gsungs pa /
analyzed: zhes so // de 'phags pa thogs med kyis byang chub sems dpa'i sa las gsungs pa /
translated: ƒÄrya Asa·πÖga explains this in the Bodhisattva Levels:

analyzed: de la rigs pa gang gis chos thams cad brjod du med pa'i ngo bo nyid yin par khong du chud par bya zhe na /
translated: ‚ÄúWhat is the reasoning by which one should understand that all phenomena are the nature of inexpressibility?

analyzed: chos rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid brtags pa 'di lta ste /
translated: The characteristics of phenomena are imputed in this way:

original: tshor ba zhes bya ba'am 'du shes zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: tshor ba zhes bya ba'am 'du shes zhes bya ba'am /
translated: ‚Äòfeeling,‚Äô ‚Äòdiscrimination,‚Äô

original: 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba'am /
analyzed: 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba'am /
translated: ‚Äòcompositional factors,‚Äô

analyzed: rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba nas snga ma bzhin du tha na mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba'i bar gang yin pa de ni btags pa tsam du zad par rig par bya ste /
translated: ‚Äòconsciousness,‚Äô and so on, up to ‚ÄònirvƒÅ·πáa‚Äô are mere imputations.

analyzed: ngo bo nyid ma yin pa de la ma gtogs pa dang de las gud na yang ngag gi spyod yul dang ngag gi yul med do //
translated: Apart from that, apart from that which is not an entity, there is no domain of speech, no domain of speech.‚Äù

analyzed: de ltar na chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni ji ltar na brjod pa de bzhin du yod par mi 'gyur la thams cad kyi thams cad du med pa yang ma yin no //
translated: Thus, the reality of phenomena does not exist as it is expressed, nor is it completely and totally nonexistent.

original: de de ltar yod pa yang ma yin la thams cad kyi thams cad du med pa yang ma yin na ci ltar yod ce na /
analyzed: de de ltar yod pa yang ma yin la thams cad kyi thams cad du med pa yang ma yin na ci ltar yod ce na /

original: yod pa ma yin pa la sgro btags pa'i legs par ma zin pa spangs pa dang / yang dag pa la skur ba btab pa'i legs par ma zin pa spangs pa yod de /üîΩchos thams cad kyi don dam pa'i ngo bo nyid de yang rnam par mi rtog @37a * //
analyzed: yod pa ma yin pa la sgro btags pa'i legs par ma zin pa spangs pa dang / yang dag pa la skur ba btab pa'i legs par ma zin pa spangs pa yod de / chos thams cad kyi don dam pa'i ngo bo nyid de yang rnam par mi rtog @37a * //
translated: It exists as the avoidance of the fault of superimposition on what is nonexistent and the avoidance of the fault of denial in regard to what is real.

analyzed: pa'i ye shes kho na'i spyod yul yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: And the ultimate reality of all phenomena should be understood as the domain of nonconceptual wisdom alone.

original: gal te chos gang dag dang dngos po gang la ji ltar brjod pa 'jug pa bzhin du chos de dag dang dngos po de de'i bdag nyid du 'gyur na ni de ltar chos gcig pu dang dngos po gcig pu'i ngo bo nyid rnam pa sna tshogs mang por
analyzed: gal te chos gang dag dang dngos po gang la ji ltar brjod pa 'jug pa bzhin du chos de dag dang dngos po de de'i bdag nyid du 'gyur na ni de ltar chos gcig pu dang dngos po gcig pu'i ngo bo nyid rnam pa sna tshogs mang por
translated: If phenomena and things were to become the nature of those phenomena and things in accordance with the way that expressions are engaged, then the nature of a single phenomenon and a single thing would be various and multiple.

original: 'gyur bar rigs so //
analyzed: 'gyur bar rigs so //
translated: If any phenomenon or any thing were the very essence of that thing or phenomenon, just as it is expressed in the terms that are applied to it, then it would be logical for that single phenomenon or single thing to have many different natures.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /üîΩ'di ltar chos gcig pu dang dngos po gcig pu la mang po dag gis rnam pa sna tshogs mang po brjod cing btags te nye bar 'dogs par byed pa la btags pa'i tshig rnam pa sna tshogs mang po dag las btags pa'i tshig gang yang rung ba gcig
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na / 'di ltar chos gcig pu dang dngos po gcig pu la mang po dag gis rnam pa sna tshogs mang po brjod cing btags te nye bar 'dogs par byed pa la btags pa'i tshig rnam pa sna tshogs mang po dag las btags pa'i tshig gang yang rung ba gcig
translated: Why is that?üîΩBecause many different terms are used to refer to a single phenomenon or a single thing. Many different terms are used to designate and impute it.

original: cig chos de dang dngos po de la de'i bdag nyid dang / de'i rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid du 'gyur la /
analyzed: cig chos de dang dngos po de la de'i bdag nyid dang / de'i rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid du 'gyur la /
translated: From among those many different terms that are used to designate it, any one of those terms would be the very essence of that phenomenon or that thing, its very nature.

original: 'dogs pa'i tshig lhag ma gzhan dag ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i nges pa ci yang mi dmigs te de bas na btags pa'i tshig thams cad ni mtha' dag gam kha cig kyang rung ste chos thams cad dang / dngos po thams cad kyi de'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ba yang med la de'i rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid du 'gyur ba yang med do //üîΩgzhan yang gal te gzugs la sogs pa'i chos sngar ji skad bstan pa rnams 'dogs pa'i tshig gi ngo bo nyid ma yin du zin na de ltar na ji dngos po sngar byung ba phyis de la dga' mgur 'dogs pa'i tshig gis nye bar 'dogs na ni 'dogs
analyzed: 'dogs pa'i tshig lhag ma gzhan dag ni ma yin no zhes bya ba'i nges pa ci yang mi dmigs te de bas na btags pa'i tshig thams cad ni mtha' dag gam kha cig kyang rung ste chos thams cad dang / dngos po thams cad kyi de'i bdag nyid du 'gyur ba yang med la de'i rang bzhin gyi ngo bo nyid du 'gyur ba yang med do // gzhan yang gal te gzugs la sogs pa'i chos sngar ji skad bstan pa rnams 'dogs pa'i tshig gi ngo bo nyid ma yin du zin na de ltar na ji dngos po sngar byung ba phyis de la dga' mgur 'dogs pa'i tshig gis nye bar 'dogs na ni 'dogs
translated: But there is no such certainty that the remaining terms of designation are not. Therefore, all terms of designation, either in their entirety or in part, are neither the intrinsic reality of all phenomena nor the intrinsic reality of all things.üîΩMoreover, if the phenomena of form and so on are not the intrinsic reality of the terms that designate them, as previously explained, then how is it that things that exist prior to the terms that designate them are later designated at will by those terms?

original: pa'i tshig gis nye bar 'dogs pa'i snga rol 'dogs pa'i tshig gis nye bar ma btags pa'i tshe /
analyzed: pa'i tshig gis nye bar 'dogs pa'i snga rol 'dogs pa'i tshig gis nye bar ma btags pa'i tshe /
translated: If that were the case, then when a phenomenon or a thing is not designated by a term, prior to being designated by a term,

original: chos de dang dngos po de ngo bo nyid med pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: chos de dang dngos po de ngo bo nyid med pa kho nar 'gyur ro //
translated: that phenomenon and that thing would be devoid of intrinsic reality.

original: ngo bo nyid med par gyur na dngos po med pa la ni 'dogs pa'i tshig gis nye bar gdags su mi rung ngo //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid med par gyur na dngos po med pa la ni 'dogs pa'i tshig gis nye bar gdags su mi rung ngo //
translated: If it were to become devoid of intrinsic reality, then it would not be suitable to designate a non-entity with a designating term.

original: 'dogs pa'i tshig gis nye bar 'dogs pa de med na yang chos dang dngos po 'dogs pa'i tshig gi ngo bo nyid du yod par mi rung ngo //
analyzed: 'dogs pa'i tshig gis nye bar 'dogs pa de med na yang chos dang dngos po 'dogs pa'i tshig gi ngo bo nyid du yod par mi rung ngo //
translated: And if that designation by a designating term did not exist, then it would not be suitable for a phenomenon and an entity to exist as the intrinsic reality of a designating term.

original: gal te 'dogs pa'i tshig nye bar 'dogs pa'i snga rol nas gzugs med de gzugs kyi bdag nyid yin te ;
analyzed: gal te 'dogs pa'i tshig nye bar 'dogs pa'i snga rol nas gzugs med de gzugs kyi bdag nyid yin te ;
translated: If form existed prior to the designation by a designating term, and it was the intrinsic reality of form,üîΩand later it was designated as form subsumed by the designating term, then in that case, even without the designation by the designating term ‚Äúform,‚Äù it would be suitable for a phenomenon that is called ‚Äúform‚Äù and an entity that is called ‚Äúform‚Äù to exist as the intrinsic reality of form.

original: phyis kyang gzugs kyi bdag nyid la gdags pa'i tshig gis bsdus pa'i gzugs su nye bar 'dogs par byed na yang de lta na ni gzugs zhes 'dogs pa'i tshig nye bar 'dogs pa med bzhin du yang gzugs zhes bya bar 'gyur ba'i chos dang / gzugs zhes bya bar 'gyur ba'i @37b dngos po la gzugs kyi blo 'jug par 'gyur ba'i rigs na mi 'jug pa ste /
analyzed: phyis kyang gzugs kyi bdag nyid la gdags pa'i tshig gis bsdus pa'i gzugs su nye bar 'dogs par byed na yang de lta na ni gzugs zhes 'dogs pa'i tshig nye bar 'dogs pa med bzhin du yang gzugs zhes bya bar 'gyur ba'i chos dang / gzugs zhes bya bar 'gyur ba'i @37b dngos po la gzugs kyi blo 'jug par 'gyur ba'i rigs na mi 'jug pa ste /
translated: But it is not suitable for the cognition of form to engage a phenomenon that is called ‚Äúform‚Äù and an entity that is called ‚Äúform‚Äù without the designation by the designating term ‚Äúform.‚Äù

original: de bas na gtan tshigs 'di dang rigs pa 'dis chos thams cad brjod du med pa'i ngo bo nyid du khong du chud par bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na gtan tshigs 'di dang rigs pa 'dis chos thams cad brjod du med pa'i ngo bo nyid du khong du chud par bya'o //
translated: Therefore, by this reason and this principle, one should understand that all phenomena are of the nature of the inexpressible.

original: gzugs la ji lta ba de bzhin du tshor ba la sogs pa nas cher na mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du ji skad bstan pa'i chos rnams la yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o //
analyzed: gzugs la ji lta ba de bzhin du tshor ba la sogs pa nas cher na mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du ji skad bstan pa'i chos rnams la yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o //
translated: Just as with form, so it is with feeling and so on, up to and including nirvana.üîΩThe entities of form and so on and the entities of the designations of form and so on do not exist by way of their own intrinsic identity.

original: gzugs la sogs pa'i chos rnams dang / gzugs la sogs pa'i dngos po la 'dogs pa'i tshig gi ngo bo nyid kyis rang gi mtshan nyid yod pa ma yin la sgro btags nas mngon par zhen pa gang yin pa dang 'dogs pa'i tshig mtshan ma'i gzhi 'dogs pa'i tshig gi mtshan ma'i rten du gyur pa
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa'i chos rnams dang / gzugs la sogs pa'i dngos po la 'dogs pa'i tshig gi ngo bo nyid kyis rang gi mtshan nyid yod pa ma yin la sgro btags nas mngon par zhen pa gang yin pa dang 'dogs pa'i tshig mtshan ma'i gzhi 'dogs pa'i tshig gi mtshan ma'i rten du gyur pa
translated: The basis of the signs of the designations of the entities of form and so on is the support of the signs of the designations of the entities of form and so on.

original: brjod du med pa'i bdag nyid kyis don dam par yod /
analyzed: brjod du med pa'i bdag nyid kyis don dam par yod /
translated: It exists ultimately by way of its inexpressible nature.

original: yang dag pa'i dngos po la thams cad kyi thams cad du med do zhes skur ba 'debs shing chud gzon par byed pa gang yin pa 'di gnyis ni chos 'dul ba 'di las rab tu nyams pa yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: yang dag pa'i dngos po la thams cad kyi thams cad du med do zhes skur ba 'debs shing chud gzon par byed pa gang yin pa 'di gnyis ni chos 'dul ba 'di las rab tu nyams pa yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: These two, who deny that anything exists at all and who destroy the true reality, should be known as those who have fallen away from this Dharma and Vinaya.üîΩThe faults of superimposition on what does not exist were analyzed and clarified from the very beginning. original: yod pa ma yin pa la sgro 'dogs pa'i nyes pa gang yin pa de dag ni thog ma nyid du dpyad cing gsal bar byas la bkrol zhing bstan zin te nyes pa de dag gis /
analyzed: yod pa ma yin pa la sgro 'dogs pa'i nyes pa gang yin pa de dag ni thog ma nyid du dpyad cing gsal bar byas la bkrol zhing bstan zin te nyes pa de dag gis /
translated: By those faults,

analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa'i dngos po yod pa ma yin la sgro btags pas /
translated: the existence of things such as form is imputed.

analyzed: chos 'dul ba 'di las rab tu nyams pa yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: It should be known that they have fallen away from this Dharma and Vinaya.

original: gzugs la sogs pa'i chos rnams kyi dngos po tsam la yang skur ba 'debs shing thams cad du chud gzon pa de chos 'dul ba 'di las ji ltar rab tu nyams par 'gyur ba de ltar bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa'i chos rnams kyi dngos po tsam la yang skur ba 'debs shing thams cad du chud gzon pa de chos 'dul ba 'di las ji ltar rab tu nyams par 'gyur ba de ltar bshad par bya ste /
translated: How those who deny the mere existence of things such as form fall away from this Dharma and Vinaya will be explained.

original: gzugs la sogs pa'i chos rnams kyi dngos po tsam la skur ba 'debs pa ni de kho na yang med la 'dogs pa yang med de gnyis ka yang mi rigs so //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa'i chos rnams kyi dngos po tsam la skur ba 'debs pa ni de kho na yang med la 'dogs pa yang med de gnyis ka yang mi rigs so //
translated: The mere entity of phenomena such as form is not denied, nor is imputation denied, because both are not tenable.

original: 'di lta ste dper na /
analyzed: 'di lta ste dper na /
translated: For example,

original: gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po rnams yod na gang zag tu gdags su rung gi med du zin na dngos po med pa la gang zag gdags su med do //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po rnams yod na gang zag tu gdags su rung gi med du zin na dngos po med pa la gang zag gdags su med do //
translated: if the aggregates such as form exist, it is suitable to impute a person. If they do not exist, it is not suitable to impute a person to a non-entity.

original: de bzhin du gzugs la sogs pa'i chos rnams kyi dngos po tsam yod na /
analyzed: de bzhin du gzugs la sogs pa'i chos rnams kyi dngos po tsam yod na /
translated: Similarly, if the mere entity of phenomena such as form exists,

original: gzugs la sogs pa'i chos rnams 'dogs pa'i tshig nye bar dgag tu rung gi med du zin na dngos po med pa la gdags pa'i tshig gis nye bar 'dogs @38a * //üîΩpa med do //
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa'i chos rnams 'dogs pa'i tshig nye bar dgag tu rung gi med du zin na dngos po med pa la gdags pa'i tshig gis nye bar 'dogs @38a * // pa med do //
translated: it is suitable to negate the words that impute phenomena such as form. If they do not exist, it is not suitable to impute with words that impute a non-entity.

original: de la 'dogs pa'i gzhi med du zin na ni gzhi med par gyur pas 'dogs pa yang med par yang 'gyur ro //
